subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: Ernesto Bertarelli, a billionaire Swiss yachtsman, said he wouldn’t enter the regatta because of the conditions set by BMW Oracle, Ellison’s team.
snippet: Ernesto Bertarelli, a billionaire Swiss yachtsman, said he wouldn’t enter the regatta because of the conditions set by BMW Oracle, Ellison’s team.
